text: April 1st was very eventful for the expecting pair! Princess Love pranked Ray J on April Fools ’ Day, and it was epic! Check out his reaction that was caught on camera here. To mark the first day of April, the woman pretended to go into labor, and she really got her husband good! Princess Love took to social media to share the video with her followers, and everyone loved the man ’ s crazy reaction to her water supposedly breaking. ‘ Got @ RayJ good after his show last night # APRILFOOLS, ’ she captioned the post. The video shows The Love and Hip Hop : Hollywood star in an elevator alongside her hubby and a few friends.
